resp = client.search(
    index="logs",
    size=0,
    aggs={
        "messages": {
            "filters": {
                "filters": [
                    {
                        "match": {
                            "body": "error"
                        }
                    },
                    {
                        "match": {
                            "body": "warning"
                        }
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
